> I downloaded a couple of scenarios off the website, but when I try to
 play them that level that says "PLEASE REGISTER" on the map pops up. 
 I dunno why that's the only level that will pop up, besides the
 original levels that came with the game.  Anyone know why it's doing
this?

Hmm.  I know this question is going to sound dumb, but are you using a
registered version of Gladiator?  The scenarios on the website only
work on registered versions of Gladiator and OpenGlad.
